buttons.name: I want to hand over a bag of money.
How do i get a job here?
I want to turn my self in.
I want to hand over illegal items.

0.text: Hi! I'm Victoria, secretary of the Sheriff's Department. How can I help?

1.text: There are a lot of interesting things going on in our Sheriff's Department all the time! We solve crimes, issue licenses for weapons, and also accept applications from citizens. We mainly work in Blaine county. By the way, do you want to get a job with us?

3.text: Do you want to join the Sheriff Department?! Amazing! Our district really needs good employees, decent people who are always ready to risk their lives for the sake of the peace of our citizens. I think you should talk to one of my colleagues, they will be able to advise you in more detail. Or you can search for the information on the state portal, there will certainly be everything on there.

4.text: Are you sure you want to turn yourself in?

5.text: Are you sure you want to hand over illegal items?
